headline.main: New York to Daily Fantasy Sports: Stop Taking Bets Here
headline.print_headline: New York to Daily Fantasy Sports: Stop Taking Bets Here

docs.snippet: New York's attorney general on Tuesday ordered the daily fantasy sports companies DraftKings and FanDuel to stop accepting bets in the state, saying their operations amount to illegal gambling....
docs.lead_paragraph: New York's attorney general on Tuesday ordered the daily fantasy sports companies DraftKings and FanDuel to stop accepting bets in the state, saying their operations amount to illegal gambling.

headline.main: Cuba: Agreements on Flights to US Likely in Coming Months
headline.print_headline: Cuba: Agreements on Flights to US Likely in Coming Months

docs.snippet: Cuban officials said Tuesday that negotiations on the normalization of relations with the United States are likely to produce agreements on regularly scheduled airline flights and three other areas in the coming months....
docs.lead_paragraph: Cuban officials said Tuesday that negotiations on the normalization of relations with the United States are likely to produce agreements on regularly scheduled airline flights and three other areas in the coming months.

headline.main: Heat Suspend Green for 2 Games Over Detrimental Conduct
headline.print_headline: Heat Suspend Green for 2 Games Over Detrimental Conduct

docs.snippet: Gerald Green will return to the Miami Heat, but only after the shooting guard serves a two-game suspension for conduct detrimental to the team....
docs.lead_paragraph: Gerald Green will return to the Miami Heat, but only after the shooting guard serves a two-game suspension for conduct detrimental to the team.

headline.main: Fed's Evans-Looking Forward to Time When Fed Can Raise Rates
headline.print_headline: Fed's Evans-Looking Forward to Time When Fed Can Raise Rates

docs.snippet: Chicago Federal Reserve Bank President Charles Evans, one of the U.S. central bank's most dovish policymakers, said on Tuesday that he looks forward to the time when the economy is strong enough to handle a Fed rate hike....
docs.lead_paragraph: Chicago Federal Reserve Bank President Charles Evans, one of the U.S. central bank's most dovish policymakers, said on Tuesday that he looks forward to the time when the economy is strong enough to handle a Fed rate hike.

headline.main: Japan Business Mood Dips as Economy Seen in Recession-Reuters Tankan
headline.print_headline: Japan Business Mood Dips as Economy Seen in Recession-Reuters Tankan

docs.snippet: Confidence among Japanese manufacturers fell in November for a third straight month to levels unseen in about 2-1/2 years, a Reuters poll showed on Wednesday, reflecting fears that a China-led slowdown in overseas demand may have pushed the econom...
docs.lead_paragraph: Confidence among Japanese manufacturers fell in November for a third straight month to levels unseen in about 2-1/2 years, a Reuters poll showed on Wednesday, reflecting fears that a China-led slowdown in overseas demand may have pushed the economy into recession.
